de.mrapp.android.dialog.model

Interface ProgressDialogDecorator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dialog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProgressDialog, ProgressDialogDecorator

    public interface ProgressDialogDecorator
extends Dialog
    Defines the interface, a decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and allows to indicate a running progress.
    Since:
    3.2.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        Dialog.Gravity

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        MATCH_PARENT, WRAP_CONTENT

    • Method Detail

      • getProgressBarColor

        int getProgressBarColor()
        Returns the color of the dialog's progress bar.
        Returns:
        The color of the dialog's progress bar, as an Integer value

      • setProgressBarColor

        void setProgressBarColor(int color)
        Sets the color of the dialog's progress bar.
        Parameters:
        color - The color, which should be set, as an Integer value

      • getProgressBarSize

        int getProgressBarSize()
        Returns the size of the dialog's progress bar.
        Returns:
        The size of the dialog's progress bar in pixels as an Integer value

      • setProgressBarSize

        void setProgressBarSize(int size)
        Sets the size of the dialog's progress bar.
        Parameters:
        size - The size, which should be set, in pixels as an Integer value. The size must be at least 0

      • getProgressBarThickness

        int getProgressBarThickness()
        Returns the thickness of the dialog's progress bar.
        Returns:
        The thickness of the dialog's progress bar in pixels as an Integer value

      • setProgressBarThickness

        void setProgressBarThickness(int thickness)
        Sets the thickness of the dialog's progress bar.
        Parameters:
        thickness - The thickness, which should be set, in pixels as an Integer value. The thickness must be at least 1

      • getProgressBarPosition

        ProgressDialog.ProgressBarPosition getProgressBarPosition()
        Returns the position of the dialog's progress bar.
        Returns:
        The position of the dialog's progress bar as a value of the enum ProgressDialog.ProgressBarPosition. The position may either be LEFT, TOP, RIGHT or BOTTOM

      • setProgressBarPosition

        void setProgressBarPosition(@NonNull
                            ProgressDialog.ProgressBarPosition position)
        Sets the position of the dialog's progress bar.
        Parameters:
        position - The position, which should be set, as a value of the enum ProgressDialog.ProgressBarPosition. The position may either be LEFT, TOP, RIGHT or BOTTOM
